name: Bitcoin News
author: TheBitcoinNews.com

sections.description:
[Bitcoin News] is the Bitcoin News plugin for WordPress. Create custom Bitcoin News & Premium Bitcoin News ( Earn Cash as Affiliate ) and watch the fresh relevant news headlines appear on your website. As an influencer, Facebook group admin, Telegram channel admin, website or blog operator, you receive participation over 3 levels (Multi Level Marketing) Level 1 = 25%, Level 2 = 7%, Level 3 = 3% when a Reader sign up for a premium package. Choose keywords, number of articles and other settings, put the feed wherever you want using widgets or shortcodes. Partner ID Earn Cash with Premium News ( Sign up here: https://thebitcoinnews.com/affiliates/ )

Current features

You can tap into hundreds articles and display Bitcoin News customized by you on your website using WordPress widgets or shortcodes.

  • Set keywords
  • Set the number of articles
  • Show abstracts
  • Show dates
  • Search in headlines vs. full articles

More features coming soon

New features

  • NEW: Premium content
  • NEW: Partner ID Earn Cash with Premium News ( Sign up here: https://thebitcoinnews.com/affiliates/ )
sections.installation:
1. Install: Install the Bitcoin News either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Create News Feeds: Create your Bitcoin News feed by generating a shortcode from the Generate Shortcode tab. Put that shortcode in posts or pages where you want to display your Bitcoin News OR create your Bitcoin News from Appearance > Widgets. From the widgets panel drag the \”BitcoinNews\” widget to the desired sidebar or widget area where you want to show your news feed. Edit the widget features to create/edit your news feed. Choose the name, number of headlines, keywords and other settings.
